CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Table 2 , the HOMO level of PQCDTB ( -5.24 eV ) was higher than that of PCZDTB by 0.2 eV because the HOMO level of the QC derivative was higher than that of carbazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |
| QC derivative |
| carbazole |

The entities were identified as "PQCDTB", "PCZDTB", "QC derivative", and "carbazole" as they are explicitly mentioned in the paragraph and are materials being compared or referenced.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

The entities "QC derivative" and "carbazole" were removed as they are not explicitly mentioned as materials in the paragraph, but rather as components of other materials. The entities "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB" are the only clear material names mentioned in the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Table 2 , the HOMO level of PQCDTB ( -5.24 eV ) was higher than that of PCZDTB by 0.2 eV because the HOMO level of the QC derivative was higher than that of carbazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.24 eV |
| 0.2 eV |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the numerical values associated with the HOMO levels of the chemical compounds. The first entity is "-5.24 eV", which is the HOMO level of PQCDTB. The second entity is "0.2 eV", which is the difference in the HOMO levels between PCZDTB and PQCDTB. These entities are precisely the same as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.24 eV |

Explanation:

After removing the entities that do not clearly refer to the "Value of material property", we are left with only one valid entity, which is "-5.24 eV", the HOMO level of PQCDTB. The other entity, "0.2 eV", is the difference between the HOMO levels of two chemical compounds, and not a value of a material property itself. Therefore, it is not included in the final table.
